post.author: Admin
post.title: Contest Hoodies and Pins to be delivered to students 10/1/14 after practice
post.description:
Dear Band Parents,
If you purchased a band contest hoodie and/or pin, we will be delivering them t
post.content:
Dear Band Parents,

If you purchased a band contest hoodie and/or pin, we will be delivering them to the students tomorrow evening (10/1/14) after 6-9 practice. All hoodies and/or pins are in bags or envelopes with the students’ names on them.

If you ordered a pin and do not receive it tomorrow night, please do not worry. We had to place a second order with the pin company and we are expecting it any day. When the pins arrive we will get the pins to your students as soon as possible.

If you have any questions, you may call or email me at 717-1532 or saberish@hotmail.com

Thank you,

Shirley Berish
